rules_text:
This spell costs {2} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Choose one or more –
• Remove all counters from target non-Gorgon creature. If it has toughness 2 or less, destroy it.
• Return target creature or planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand. You gain 4 life.
• Exile target player’s graveyard.
